hackathon-description-text: Allstate is partnering with UIUC to host a hackathon.
hackathon-rules:
* Teams can consist of up to 5 people, but a maximum of 3 prizes will be awarded.
** The number of prizes awarded is dependent on the number of teams that register. If <10 teams register, only 1st place will be awarded. If 10-20 teams register, 1st & 2nd place will be awarded. If >20 team register, 1st, 2nd, and 3rd will be awarded.
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Electrical and Computer Engineering Building, 306 N Wright St, Urbana, IL 61801, USA
hackathon-location-address: Electrical and Computer Engineering Building, 306 N Wright St, Urbana, IL 61801, USA
hackathon-description-header: Build a Connected Home app that creates a compelling and differentiated Connected Home experience
